ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Auction questions (was Re: what weapon? and other questions...)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Unfortunately,the value of pelts all depends on who wants them and apparently is extremely varied depending on which server you re on (eg. someone had
ygData.messageBody:
--- compugeeke <compugeeke@...> wrote:
> My biggest question is, How do I know what
> prices pelts go for?

> maybe some kind soul can list fair prices for
> the cat and bear pelts,
> mainly so i don't feel like i am ripping other
> PC's off, but also so
> i dont rip myself off.

Unfortunately,the value of pelts all depends on
who wants them and apparently is extremely varied
depending on which server you're on (eg. someone
had mentioned selling the HQ bear pelt for 40pp,
but on my server they only go for 25pp) Your best
bet would be to hang around zones like east
commonlands for awhile and listen to what other
people are buying or selling them for. Good luck! =)

=====
Kinrea Keres 51st Teir'dal Champion <Swift Law Coalition>
Danallis Stormcaller 40th Half Elven Druid <SLC>
Sinarya L'achesis 29th Teir'dal Necromancer <SLC>
Lereny 14th Half Elven Bard <SLC>
Pippina 6th Vah Shir Beastlord
Saryrn Server
